name: Totem Melee
description:
• A 4 player local 2vs2 game about teamwork and hillarious shenanigans.
  • Lead your tribe to victory by erecting a totem to your deity!
  • Prevent your rivals from achieving the same goal!
  • Avoid the deadly pits littering the sacred temple!
  • Use powerups and traps to secure your victory!
  • Made during the Global Game Jam 2016 with the theme "Ritual":
    http://globalgamejam.org/2016/games/totem-melee
